scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev" "npx wait-on http://localhost:4000 && npm run electron"
scripts.dev: CLIPP_ENV=dev cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.create-binaries: swiftc -target arm64-apple-macos10.13 scripts/get_clipboard_image.swift -o backend/native/get_clipboard_image.arm64 && swiftc -target x86_64-apple-macos10.13 scripts/get_clipboard_image.swift -o backend/native/get_clipboard_image.x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64:dev: node scripts/set-env.js dev && ARCH=arm64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64:dev: node scripts/set-env.js dev && ARCH=x64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64:prod: node scripts/set-env.js prod && ARCH=arm64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64:prod: node scripts/set-env.js prod && ARCH=x64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --x64
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mac:arm64:dev && npm run build:mac:x64:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mac:arm64:prod && npm run build:mac:x64:prod
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mac:arm64:prod && npm run publish:github
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:frontend && TEST_MODE=true playwright test
